Html:
Hi,

I m unable to add the ".csproj" file to the source control, I do not understand what is happening !
I have correct a few problems in the previous check-ins but without theses files it is difficult to
work.

Have you an idea ?

Thanks

First, sorry for the missing .csproj files. I'm still not used to working with TFS. Last couple of years I've been working with Subversion and now I can't find my way around in VS. I've just added the missing files and I hope you won't get many conflicts.

Second, I notice that you started renaming the xml element in fsl files. Please note that yesterday I've added an update script to automate upgrading from earlier versions. So I would appreciate if you consult such changes first with me or at lest let me know what you are going to do.

Szymon
